EmailTemplate.subject: Bite the Ballot Changemakers - Induction (Tuesday)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations {!Contact.FirstName},
You have been successful in applying for Bite the Ballot's Changemakers course starting tomorrow, Tuesday 15th December. Please click here to get your free Eventbrite ticket for the event by as soon as possible - places are limited!
You'll be receiving a phone call from us this afternoon to confirm that you have all the information you need to get there, so please keep your phone near you whenever you're not in lessons! Sending a text back is also fine - we just need to know that you're all sorted for the session.
If you have any questions then please get in touch with Megan from the NCS Graduate team on 07587 037601, or by emailing graduates@the-challenge.org.
Looking forward to seeing you there!
Megan
